p: The enantioselective GC analysis was carried out with an enantioselective capillary column, based on 30% diacethylterbutylsilyl-β-cyclodextrin in PS-086 (25 m × 0.25 mm × 0.25 μm, purchased from MEGA, Milan, Italy), installed in the same GC-MS system. Helium was used as carrier gas (Indura, Guayaquil, Ecuador).
